thread.title: The Advisory Board Company to Host Analyst and Investor Day October 28, 2015
thread.title_full: The Advisory Board Company to Host Analyst and Investor Day October 28, 2015

author: admin
title: The Advisory Board Company to Host Analyst and Investor Day October 28, 2015
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: The Advisory Board Company 
WASHINGTON, Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The Advisory Board Company (NASDAQ: ABCO) announced today that it will host an Analyst and Investor Day on Wednesday, October 28, 2015 from 8 AM to 4 PM, EDT, at the Ronald Reagan Building and International Trade Center in Washington, DC. The Analyst and Investor Day will be held in conjunction with Amplify, the Advisory Board Company's member technology summit. In addition to product demonstrations and case studies as part of the technology summit, the senior management team will provide an overview of the company's insights and solutions and discuss the value proposition of both healthcare and higher education offerings. 
If you would like to attend, please RSVP by October 21, 2015 to theadvisoryboard@westwicke.com or (443) 450-4189. 
About The Advisory Board Company 
The Advisory Board Company is the leading provider of insight-driven technology , research , and services for organizations in transforming industries. Through its innovative membership model, the Company collaborates with more than 230,000 leaders at 5,200 member organizations to elevate performance and solve their most pressing problems. The Company provides strategic guidance, actionable insights, cloud-based software solutions, and comprehensive implementation and management services. For more information, visit www.advisory.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/the-advisory-board-company-to-host-analyst-and-investor-day-october-28-2015-300160419.html 
SOURCE The Advisory Board Company
